name: Jelly Wrestle
description: Be a part of the battle in the fairy world of Jelly Wrestle game! Fight many strange and amusing jelly characters at the arena. Choose your hero wisely â€“ learn its superpowers and strikes, power its characteristics up, parry the attacks and become the real king of the jelly ring!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel 'i' series/AMD K10 series introduced 2009 onwards. 2 physical cores, 2Ghz 64 bit Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 / AMD ATI 5550 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
